participant_1.background:
I was disappointed when my blueberry pie didn't win first place at the county fair.
I spend a lot of time playing with my cat.
i hope to travel the world one day.
I am close to my family, but I sometimes have to spend time alone to recharge.

participant_2.background:
I'm afraid that I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was.
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
I am of mixed race and I am proud of my heritage.
both of my parents are teachers.
i have an iphone.

content.text: Hi there! What's your name?
Hi there! My name is participant_2.
Hi participant_1. My name is participant_1.
It's nice to meet you, participant_2.
It's nice to meet you too, participant_1. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach on the weekends to relax and have fun.
That sounds fun! I love the beach too. What's your favorite thing to do at the beach?
I love to swim, play in the sand, and build sandcastles.
Those are all great things to do at the beach! I love swimming too. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to cook, but I'm not very good at it. I'm afraid I'll never be as good of a cook as my father was.
My dad is a great cook too! I love his cooking. What's your favorite thing to cook?
My favorite thing to cook is blueberry pie. I made a blueberry pie for the county fair, but it didn't win first place.
That's too bad! I'm sure it was delicious. I love blueberry pie.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to travel. I hope to travel the world one day.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to travel the world too. I'm glad you have such a great family and friends.
Thanks! I'm glad too.
It was nice talking to you, participant_1.
It was nice talking to you too, participant_2.
